articles.title: Amid Russia threat, Nato activates 40,000-strong Response Force in historic first - India Today
articles.description: Nato has put its Response Force on standby in a bid to reassure allies neighbouring Ukraine and Russia that their security is guaranteed. This, however, does not mean that Nato troops will go into Ukraine, which is not a member.

articles.title: Why Indians head to Ukraine to study medicine - Economic Times
articles.description: Ukraine is the third most popular destination after China and the Philippines for Indian students who want to pursue medicine. There are about 18,000 medical students stuck in conflict-ridden Ukraine.
